page.title: 20BUDBROOKE COMBINED SCHOOL
page.content: has 265 children aged 5-12 in 10 classes taught by head,10 full-time & 3 part-time teachers.All classes do English,Maths,P.E.,R.E.,Art/craft Music.History,geography,science social studies health etc.taught through topics.Top 4 years have games-football netball, cricket,athletics,rounders. Top 2 years have science and French. Clubs:orchestra,Nature,Bookshop. Special events:Sept.year starts;Oct. Harvest service;Nov.Fayre to raise money for Christmas;Dec. concerts for parents & senior citizens,parties;Feb. staff-parent meetings to discuss children;Mar.play or concert for parents;Apr.Easter parade;June day trip by each class,top class go to Boggle Hole Youth Hostel for 5 days field study trip,cycling proficiency tests;July sports days & end of year reportsGood Parent-Teacher Association
